sentences.translation: 她为一位插图画家当模特儿。

sentences.sentence: There is one other early Romantic, who was an illustrator as well.
sentences.translation: 还有一位早期的浪漫主义者，也是一位插画家。

sentences.sentence: In ''On Thin Ice'', Richard Ellis, a writer and illustrator, paints a natural history of the icon of the north, the polar bear.
sentences.translation: 在《薄冰之上》一书中，作家兼插画家理查·埃利斯描绘了北极图标，北极熊的自然史。
